title: New: Virgin Suicide – Killing Everyone That You Know
content:
With a sinister, slightly twisted demeanour that Coma Cinema would reveal in, Danish group Virgin Suicide absolutely nail the murderous romantic stereotype on their debut track Killing Everyone That You Know.

Placebo-esque vocals meet a Muse inspired whine, it’s perfectly written blood-soaked pop – “By the edge of your mouth / there’s a downstroke from tonight / it’s burning two bloody rivers” spewing out a haphazard yet thoroughly listenable cacophony of  sounds.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
